mapper.insert: insert into TRNetGridEventInvolvedPersons (PersonsID, EventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact) values (#{personsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{involvedPersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{involvedPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{involvedPersonRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{involvedPersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TRNetGridEventInvolvedPersons set EventID = #{eventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, InvolvedPersonCertID = #{involvedPersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, InvolvedPersonName = #{involvedPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InvolvedPersonRemark = #{involvedPersonRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InvolvedPersonContact = #{involvedPersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PersonsID = #{personsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select PersonsID, EventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRNetGridEventInvolvedPersons where PersonsID = #{personsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select PersonsID, EventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRNetGridEventInvolvedPersons where EventID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
